attributes.action: Allow the original petitioner to post a further statement in reply to the PM's office response to a petition
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The responses that the PM's office posts to closed petitions are generally inadequate. The original petitioner should have a chance to point out the ways in which the response is inadequate.

Ideally, the PM's office would then post a further response and an actual dialogue could take place.

rejection.details: Thanks for this idea, which we will treatv as feedback, rather than the subject of a petition. We will certainly give it strong consideration.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
